title: Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) (Workplace Relations 
Commission) (Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 24 September 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 31) (workplace relation commission) (designation) order 2020 (2) order come operation 24 september 2020

title: Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of
heading: 2. The Workplace Relations Commission is designated for the purposes of
text_raw:
2. The Workplace Relations Commission is designated for the purposes of 
section 31 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 
2020 (No. 13 of 2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 September, 2020. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Business, Enterprise and Innovation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 25th September, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [359] 3
